lead_paragraph: MANN--Francis Bernard, Sr. 93, (Frank) died March 30, 2016, in Chapel Hill, NC. Born September 29, 1922, he was the cherished son of Thomas and Erna Mann of New Haven, CT. He was senior class president at New Haven Commercial High School, graduating in 1939 and attended Quinnipiac College before serving in the U.S. Army in North Africa during World War II. He graduated from Indiana University and receiving his MBA from NYU. He and his wife Elaine lived in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, Delaware, and Michigan as required by Francis's career path from accountant to corporate financial officer. He worked at Arthur Andersen, Colgate Palmolive and the Budd Company. Francis was predeceased by his wife of 60 years Elaine (2008) and daughter Alison (2011). Funeral services are private. The family invites friends who wish to remember Francis to make a donation to the Ovarian National Cancer Alliance: www.ovariancancer.org, to the Elaine Mann and Norma Lane Fund at the Holton Arms School: www.holton-arms.edu/ support, or to a charity of their choice. 1/3
